name: Koroyoto SMASH
description:
Koroyoto SMASH

PLAY IN FULLSCREEN.

Set the Speed then Set the Angle and watch Koroyoto FLY

Ramen = more speed + 100 points

TNT = more speed and a boost + 500 points

All art done by me with Paint.NET

(Originally I had a game submitted called "Bouncy Dodge"...I didnt like the fact that it had to be downloaded to be played and the game itself was not worth it, so this time i decided to export to HTML so more people could play it right in the browser)

This is my OFFICIAL submission for the 2022 1Button GameJam
